title: 3 and Out - Texans/Deshaun Deteriorating; Wild Card Weekend Preview; Coaching Carousel Latest; Justin Fields' Massive Moment; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Texans/Deshaun Deteriorating; Wild Card Weekend Preview; Coaching Carousel Latest; Justin Fields' Massive Moment; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John breaks down the rapidly deteriorating relationship between Deshaun Watson and the Texans, and why the Houston franchise needs a break from the Belichick tree. He also previews the Wild Card Weekend games, gives his picks, gives his take on the latest coaching carousel developments, explains why Justin Fields has the most to gain from a huge National Championship Game performance, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
